title: Audiences are sick of being treated as consumers
description: In 2026, journalism will return to the people who never left the work. The future will belong to reporters, editors, publishers, and voices rooted in community, the ones who have spent years building real relationships and earning trust through presence, accountability, and consistency. Audiences are sick of being treated as consumers. They want to follow...
